short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple extension which simplifies your weekly meal planning and groceries!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PantryPal is a straightforward meal planning and grocery list app designed for simplicity. It helps you organize your weekly meals and shopping lists.

* Weekly Meal Planning: Manually input your meal choices for breakfast, lunch, and dinner, for 7 days of the week.
* Editable Categories: Organize items into different grocery lists like Produce, Dairy, and Meat or based on the stores.
* Manual List Creation: Build your shopping list item by item.
